title: Ep84 Reservation Crimes
description: This week, the gals discuss some issues facing Native communities. Topics include boarding schools from hell, haunting legal loopholes, and a group who stumbled into wealth--and mortal danger. Pop open a bottle of Native Vines Cabernet Franc, burn your history books, vote in every election possible, and tune in to Reservation Crimes.   This ep is supported by TalkSpace. Get $45 off your 1st month at www.talkspace.com/gals
